title: Liquidation Business 103 - Online Arbitrage and Reselling
headline: Learn digital solutions for optimising reselling and eCommerce efficiency in this free online course.
description: A decent ‘pallet’, according to experts, can produce a turnover of 100–250 per cent. Many online stores, such as Target and Home Depot, offer pitifully low prices on high-quality products. To be courageous in the internet arbitrage domain, you must understand how to analyse commodities. Learn to use strategic software that has helped other sellers develop their businesses through Poshmark and Mercari and become more efficient.

courseDescription:
Do you know how easy it is to get started with internet arbitrage? Here are the initial steps: enrol in the course, create an Amazon Seller account, purchase items, ship it to Amazon ‘Fulfillment by Amazon’ (FBA) and watch the sales roll in! For most first-time sellers, entering the liquidation market can be intimidating. Regardless of your level of knowledge, this course intends to give you an accurate compilation of Amazon eCommerce lectures, including tips, instructions and discussions on GTIN Exemptions and how to manage intellectual property (IP) disputes. Likewise, understanding how to become 'ungated' is critical since it extends your selling options, especially in low-competition product areas. 

This course includes an entire section on how to become unblocked for restricted categories or top brands on Amazon.com. The tips from our expert, Bryan Guerra, about online arbitrage and reselling will help you look credible, dependable and trustworthy as an Amazon seller. Learn how to manage the company's fulfilment strategy. Discover what to do if Amazon divides your shipments and how to obtain shipping materials for high-volume sales. These classes will help you become more practical in your product distribution. Profit is the ultimate advantage of arbitrage, especially if you spot a good deal. First-time retailers think that cross-listing applications aren't worth the effort. However, after learning about software and automation, you'll grasp the benefits of integrating programs like SourceMogul, List Perfectly and ScanUnlimited. Most sellers have developed their companies using this software through Poshmark, eBay and Mercari. You're well aware of how time-consuming managing closet sharing from your phone is. As a result, to participate in the internet arbitrage business environment, it is crucial to share as many product listings as feasible. Simple Posher, for example, interacts seamlessly with any computer, quickly updating listings and selling.

Finally, you gain essential tips for electronic commerce that will assist you when dealing with difficult buyers. You'll also know how to manage a liquidation business outside the United States. This international approach will require your understanding of the selection process to determine a cost-efficient third-party company capable of performing crucial responsibilities such as inventory, storage, packaging, labelling and shipping to FBA. This course facilitates your initiation into the online seller business. This business model offers various advantages, like doing business with only a computer connected to the internet. This endeavour has the promise of being a treasure chest of information. Note that you could run it on the go. What is holding you back? Enrol now!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module explains various recommendations for managing your Amazon Seller Account. Start with the conditions for GTIN exemptions. Also, you will review how to unblock categories or big brands. Then, you will gain insight into supplies, sales tax, and insurance for high sales volume.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module describes online arbitrage and an e-commerce toolkit for assisting sellers with tasks for product sourcing, product listing, and order fulfilment. You will learn about the benefits of Vendoo and Sourcemogul, including other digital solutions for exposure and sales. Finish with a detailed lesson on outsourcing your FBA operations.
topics: Practical Suggestions for Online Stores - Learning Outcomes

slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • After finishing this module, you will be able to:
    • Define the Amazon IP claim procedure and the actions to prevent them
    • Discuss the FBM requirements to fulfil orders on marketplaces like Poshmark and Mercari
    • Identify the process to deal with Amazon GTIN exemptions
    • Explain the steps to handle split shipments to FBA
    • Outline the main strategies to get ungated on Amazon.com
    • Recognise a 10+ item invoice to unblock your account from an Amazon category or brand

  • Lesson Summary

  • An Amazon IP claim is a formal complaint by a brand alleging that another Amazon seller violates its copyright. To avoid being removed from the Amazon Buy Box or having your selling privileges for that ASIN revoked, use ScanUnlimited and IP Alert.
  • Ungated in Restricted Categories on Amazon
    • Get "auto-ungated" for particular brands by selling +2000 units over six months (a roughly daily 11–12 units for over six months) without any significant issues and a five-star rating mostly.
    • Use an accepted manufacturer/supplierof 10+ units of the targeted brand.
    • Obtainan authorization letter from the brand permitting you to sell their products on Amazon.

  • Lesson Summary

  • An Amazon IP claim is a formal complaint by a brand alleging that another Amazon seller violates its copyright. To avoid being removed from the Amazon Buy Box or having your selling privileges for that ASIN revoked, use ScanUnlimited and IP Alert.
  • Ungated in Restricted Categories on Amazon
    • Get "auto-ungated" for particular brands by selling +2000 units over six months (a roughly daily 11–12 units for over six months) without any significant issues and a five-star rating mostly.
    • Use an accepted manufacturer/supplierof 10+ units of the targeted brand.
    • Obtainan authorization letter from the brand permitting you to sell their products on Amazon.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • State the advantages and constraints of Vendoo and ListPerfectly as the best e-commerce software
    • Describe the usefulness of enforcing automation to manage Poshmark sales and exposure
    • Outline the characteristics of a good sourcing software for online arbitrage
    • Indicate the methodology to start an online arbitrage business outside the U.S
    • Recognise the benefits of using the Smart Pricing feature for Mercari
    • Summarise the pros and cons of outsourcing the fulfilment operation for your Amazon store

  • Lesson Summary

  • Sourcemogul
    • Beginner-friendly you can start using it in less than 30 minutes.
    • Sources for top-profitable merchandise.
    • Pricing for online arbitrage or wholesale is the same rate.
  • Tactical Arbitrage
    • Learning to manage the ways of working can take days or weeks.
    • Sources for highly profitable items.
    • Pricing for the wholesale membership increases if you like to scale.
  • Strategies for Poshmark and Mercari
    • The Smart Pricing function updates (in real-time) the sale price until it reaches the minimum price or the product is sold. The strategy exposes the merchandise to potential buyers each time the price gets refreshed. This Smart Pricing feature makes Mercari a valuable platform for reselling online arbitrage.
    • Significantly raise Poshmark sales by integrating automation software or tools. Automated sharing activities will increase the closet's visibility, which will affect sales turnover.
